title: Aditi's Game
description: Aditi is a voluptuous young woman in her early thirties, working as an Assistant Professor at an acclaimed university. Having had her heart broken once in her twenties, she enjoys playing games with much younger inexperienced men, most of them her college students. But as Aditi starts meeting and spending time with the much older Prof. Gupta, she discovers that her heart, though once broken, is not beyond repair. Will Aditi discover true love or will she go back to her old ways?
author: Chetna Khanna
